text: 22:5 There will be no night there ¦ There will be no night K HF ¦ Night will be no more ANT CTThere will be no night there, and they will not need 22:5 any lamp or the light of the sun ¦ any lamp or light K HF ¦ the light of a lamp or the light of the sun CTany lamp or the light of the sun, for the Lord God will give them light, and they will reign forever and ever.
